explanation: Gathering all necessary ingredients and tools ensures that the cooking process is smooth and uninterrupted.
title: Preparation
description: Identify and gather all necessary ingredients such as pasta, eggs, cheese, pancetta or bacon, and black pepper. Prepare these ingredients by chopping, separating, grating, and mixing as needed. Ensure you have the required tools like a pot, pan, whisk, and grater ready before starting the cooking process.

explanation: Cooking the pasta correctly is crucial as it forms the base of the dish.
title: Cook Pasta
description: Boil water in a pot and cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain the pasta, reserving some of the pasta water for later use.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Pasta
original_subgoals.description: Boil water in a pot, adding salt to enhance flavor, and cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain the pasta, reserving some of the pasta water for later use.

explanation: Cooking the pancetta or bacon adds flavor and texture to the dish.
title: Cook Meat
description: In a pan, cook the pancetta or bacon over medium heat until it is crispy. Remove from heat and set aside, leaving the rendered fat in the pan for added flavor.

explanation: Creating the sauce is essential for the creamy texture of Carbonara.
title: Make Sauce
description: In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated cheese until smooth. Season with black pepper. Add reserved pasta water to thin the mixture, forming the creamy sauce when combined with the hot pasta.

original_subgoals.title: Make Sauce

explanation: Combining all elements ensures the dish is cohesive and flavorful.
title: Combine Ingredients
description: Return the cooked pasta to the pan with the rendered fat. Off the heat, add the egg and cheese mixture, stirring quickly to coat the pasta and create a creamy sauce. Add reserved pasta water as needed to achieve the desired consistency. Mix in the cooked pancetta or bacon.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Ingredients

explanation: Final touches enhance the flavor and presentation of the dish.
title: Finish Dish
description: Season the pasta with additional black pepper and grated cheese to taste. Serve immediately, ensuring the dish is hot and the sauce is creamy.

title: Prepare Ingredients
description: Prepare additional ingredients such as garlic and pepper by cracking and sieving them as needed. Ensure these ingredients are ready to be added to the dish at the appropriate time.
